title: Identification, quiet similar to Trade Gothic
content:
Hello,

I'm trying to identify this font ; at first sight, I was convinced it was Trade Gothic font, but there are some differences…  
If someone can help me with this, it would be very kind. Thanks !

Sincerely,

Jules

author: Dreamburger

comments.content: looks like Arial Bold to me.
